overview: Join surf movie director Jack McCoy as he travels the Pacific islands in this remastered edition of a Billabong classic. Sunny Garcia, Keith Maloy and other surfing legends raise tube riding to an art form in exotic tropical locales. A showcase for McCoy's sense of humor and skill at pairing his footage with music, the film is presented with an all-new look at the making of the movie.
title: Sik Joy
